Object Flight Path: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsI was coming out of work tonight around 6:45 pm with my 2 other coworkers & I always look at the night sky when I come out . We were talking for about 5 Minutes when soething caught the corner of my eye , When saw something move here when I lookked over to Orions belt area I saw 2 moving I thought stars , but they were reddish in color there was 2 of them , Going in a very fast pattern it would change directional paths it seem it was also moving fast out of our atmoshpere, less than 30 secounds later a 3rd one was right behind alomst in the same irratic path , all 3 of us, witnessed it , not sure what is was , it did not look like a meteor shower or a satliette or rocker ship, moving too fast with odd up & down paths & side to side then would almost a u turn movement. I lost site of the object because it was too far out of our atomoshpere it move from southeast to northeast.
